ygData.subject: Re: Lambent armor and Solusek Champion
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The kobold champion seems to be a named mob in Sol B.  The Solusek champions in Sol A seem to be just another type of goblin.  I ve seen three on tracking
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 13 Oct 1999, Greg Gillan wrote:
>
> Okay, here's a question. For the lambent vambraces one of the things you
> need is fiery vambraces from a solusek champion. I know there is a kobold
> champion in Solusek B, but this seems like a pretty hard kill to aquire this
> item (in comparison to the other pieces). Not having spent much time in
> Solusek A, I was wondering if there's a goblin champion there that this
> might be referring to instead? Anyone know much about Sol A that has an
> answer?

The kobold champion seems to be a named mob in Sol B. The
Solusek champions in Sol A seem to be just another type of
goblin. I've seen three on tracking at once, and two in the
same room. They appear at various spots around Sol A, mostly
in the section around the king room and bar area.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
